messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: So we got a syndie or two on our station

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Im the new cap the sssyndi threat hasss passsed and were all doin dandy good day

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Beer Continent XXXVI door subroutines. Severity level of 3. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Beer Continent XXXVI door subroutines. Severity level of 3. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Im the fucking cap noone outranksss me but i dont care beepsssky isss not for killing and i dont care what you do assslong asss we get thisss place in ssshape doesss anyone want anything or need anything i dont want to be evil

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Who wantsss to do sssomin fun?

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: Firssst one to get me a flacid bucket getsss there own pet me i can do it with ssscience

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: No theres not.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Eva. Are you deaf? What the AI Yelled. Also dont call the shuttle.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Yeah but we see into Maint!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Also, What the actual fuck did Cargonia shove in their warehouse?
Like jesus, If you wanted to blow the station just fuck the SM not mess with fucking ANTIMATTER.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Russian Outreach Program

Cargo: A group of angry Russians want to have a party. Can you send them your cargo shuttle then make them disappear?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Cargo shuttle commandeered by CentCom.

The cargo shuttle should return in five minutes. Have some supply points for your trouble.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Port Primary Hallway.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: AI Satellite Atmos.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Kitchen.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.
